name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XBlock | Block Porn & Sensitive Content on X and Twitter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block porn, adult content, and sensitive material on X.com (Twitter) easily with XBlock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free Chrome extension to block porn and other sensitive content on X (Twitter).

X does not offer a native way to completely block sensitive content like porn and gore - that is why we created XBlock.

With XBlock, you can browse X (Twitter) and filter out sensitive and adult content.

Whenever a tweet tagged as "sensitive content" comes on to your feed, the extension hides it completely.

XBlock is the only chrome extension that blocks sensitive content, porn, adult content, gore, etc. on X (Twitter)
